Items.Name: Temporal Gambling Device
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 10[^Money]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 10[^Money]
Items.Flavor: Yes, it’s incredibly illegal but they haven't caught me yet!

Items.Name: Temporal Loan
Items.Text:
When you [[BoldText invent]] this, gain 15[^Money], gain 1[^Evil]

At the start of stage 2 lose 15[^Money]
Items.Flavor: Your future profit score is high enough for me to approve this loan

Items.Name: Planned Fame
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] for every non [^Yellow] invention you own and gain 2[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 5[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 3[^Good]
Items.Flavor: If I'm famious you gain, so do we have a deal?

Items.Name: Black Hole Energy
Items.Text:
At the start of stage 2 gain 4[^Energy]

[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Parts]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 5[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Nothing can escape a black hole's gravity... while in the same dimension

Items.Name: Science Assistant Program
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Energy], gain 2[^Science]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Science]
Items.Flavor: Alecho run test suite 3

Items.Name: Chaos Orb
Items.Text:
Each of your [[BoldText Chaos]] inventions gets an additional [[BoldText Chance]]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] This turn all your [[BoldText Chaos]] inventions get another additional [[BoldText Chance]]
Items.Flavor: I make my own luck!

Items.Name: Dark Matter Shipping
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Parts], gain 10[^Money]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 5[^Money]
Items.Flavor: If they abuse the dark matter, we'll just go back in time and cancel their order

Items.Name: Holo Disguise
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Present] [^Activity] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Present] [^Activity] off the top of the deck
Items.Flavor: Today I'm the president, inquiring about some information

Items.Name: Science Smuggling Program
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science], gain 10[^Money]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 5[^Money]
Items.Flavor: Other countries pay top dollar for last week's discoveries

Items.Name: Cyber-Genetic Enhancements
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 3[^Money] for every [^Biotech] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Biotech] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: We make the normal human body look outdated

Items.Name: Micro Fusion Battery
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] for every non [^Yellow] invention you own and gain 2[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 10[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 3[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Who needs a charger when you have a battery life of 9 years

Items.Name: Mutant Researchers
Items.Text:
When you [[BoldText invent]] this, gain 3[^Science], gain 1[^Evil]

At the start of stage 2 lose 3[^Science]
Items.Flavor: The research is terrific, though things have a way of getting out of hand

Items.Name: Chaos Insomnia Implant
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] [[BoldText Invent]] 1 of the top 2 cards of the invention deck paying 2 less resources of your choice

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2 additional [[BoldText Chances]] with this invention this turn
Items.Flavor: I can invent in my sleep, and then I spend the morning figuring out what the heck I invented

Items.Name: Chaos Brain In A Jar
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Draw 2 inventions face up; it counts as you [[BoldText Drafted]] them

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Draw 2 additional inventions face up; it counts as you [[BoldText drafted]] them
Items.Flavor: This brain always has ideas, I'm just not sure if any of them are good!

Items.Name: Perfection AI
Items.Text: [^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] for every invention you own and gain 1[^Science], 1[^Parts], and 1[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: These inventions must be meticulously maintained

Items.Name: Rube Goldberg Machine
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 2[^Good]

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each other Rube Goldburg Machine you own
Items.Flavor: ...That dead bug falls on a marble...

Items.Name: Secret Research Base
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] for every non [^Yellow] invention you own and gain 2[^Science]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 5[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Science]
Items.Flavor: All the best gathered at an undisclosed location

Items.Name: Universal Application
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Science] for every invention you invented this turn that has an [^Science] cost

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find one that costs [^Science] and draw it
Items.Flavor: This data could also be used to invent all these other inventions

Items.Name: Emergancy Shelter Program
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Parts], gain 2[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: Giving shelter to those who lost their homes through nature disaster or war

Items.Name: Temporal Investment Program
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that only gain [^Money] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Activity] off the top of the deck that gives only [^Money]
Items.Flavor: Investing money I will have acquired

Items.Name: Scientific Publishing Program
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Science] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Activity] off the top of the deck that gives [^Science]
Items.Flavor: Just enough Science for the masses to debate over, while us real scientists do the work

Items.Name: Deja Vu Device
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] You can do one of your previous [^Activity] again

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] You can do another one of your previous [^Activity] again
Items.Flavor: “Is it just me or-” “Deja vu, that’s what you said last time too”

Items.Name: Outsourced Science Team
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 5[^Money], gain 2[^Science]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Science]
Items.Flavor: Good Scienctist research, Great scientist outsource

Items.Name: Creative Solutions Net
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Money] for every [^Green] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Green] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: Some people say our solutions are evil, our solutions aren't evil they are creative

Items.Name: Space Elevator
Items.Text:
At the start of stage 2 gain 20[^Money]

[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Parts]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 5[^Money]
Items.Flavor: Moving people and resources to and from space!

Items.Name: Hyper Light Jet
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] for every non [^Yellow] invention you own and gain 2[^Parts]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 5[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Strap in we will be accross the globe in 36 seconds

Items.Name: Automated Evac Tranport
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 5[^Money], gain 2[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: When there is an emergancey, the AET quickly and efficiently goes in and gets the people out

Items.Name: Temporal Satellite
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Money] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Past] [^Activity] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Past] [^Activity] off the top of the deck
Items.Flavor: Wanna see what happened back then? Feel free to zoom in to that time

Items.Name: Fortune Telling AI
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Future] [^Activity] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Future] [^Activity] off the top of the deck
Items.Flavor: Ever wanted to see your future?

Items.Name: Secret Time Society
Items.Text:
1 more [^Activity] is drawn at the start of [[BoldText Act]] phase

[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] for every non [^Yellow] invention you own and Gain 1[^ChronoMatter]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 12[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^ChronoMatter] and D&R 1[^Activity]
Items.Flavor: The elite like to live longer, as long as it remains pure its very profitable

Items.Name: Inventor's Space
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science], gain 2[^Parts]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Here we have lots of parts to invent until you're content

Items.Name: Super Efficient Conductor
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Energy] for every invention you invented this turn that has an [^Energy] cost

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find one that costs [^Energy] and draw it
Items.Flavor: By being extremly efficient, we can have much more power then we should have

Items.Name: Black Hole Generator
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science], gain 2[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 5[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: The more I work on this, the better it gets

Items.Name: Elite Publicity Program
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 3[^Money] for each [^Yellow] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: A richer Future

Items.Name: Waste Zero Protocol
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Parts] for every invention you invented this turn that has an [^Parts] cost

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find one that costs [^Parts] and draw it
Items.Flavor: Waste not, want not

Items.Name: Black Market Program
Items.Text: You may sell [^Science], [^Parts], or [^Energy] for 5[^Money]
Items.Flavor: There are people paying fortunes for resources they need; you just gotta know where to look

Items.Name: Fusion Batteries
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Energy], gain 10[^Money]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 5[^Money]
Items.Flavor: The power companies wish they could charge us with assault and batteries

Items.Name: Rube Goldberg Machine
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 2[^Good]

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each other Rube Goldburg Machine you own
Items.Flavor: ...that marble rolls into a bomb...

Items.Name: Combustion Plant
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Parts], gain 2[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 5[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Don't bring those safety concerns in here! It's a power plant that literally runs off explosions!

Items.Name: Chaos Workbench
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 2[^Evil]

[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1 of the top 2 cards from the [^Mod] deck paying 1 less [^Parts] for it

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain an additional 2 [[BoldText Chances]] with this invention for this turn
Items.Flavor: My newest improvement! What it does? We will have to wait and see

Items.Name: Hyper Effecient Circuits
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 3[^Money] for every [^Robotic] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Robotic] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: We will make robots so cheap that only the rich will have light bulbs

Items.Name: Rube Goldberg Machine
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 2[^Good]

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each other Rube Goldburg Machine you own
Items.Flavor: ...A satellite reflects a death ray fired into space and kills a bug...

Items.Name: Temporal Mod Shop
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for each [^Mod] you attached to an invention this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Usable at the start of [[BoldText Act]] phase: reserve a [^Mod]
Items.Flavor: The modding community is very supportive in the Future

Items.Name: Intro to Future Societies
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for each different color of invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: A look into the socities of the Future

Items.Name: Spy Bots
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 2[^Science]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 2[^Science]
Items.Flavor: All your Science are belong to us!

Items.Name: Research Exchange Program
Items.Text: You may convert [^Science] into [^Parts] or [^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Ooh, my new transfer parts have arrived!

Items.Name: Time Stop Implant
Items.Text:
1 more [^Activity] is drawn at the start of [[BoldText Act]] phase

[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^ChronoMatter]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 4[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^ChronoMatter] and D&R 1[^Activity]
Items.Flavor: Sometimes you gotta stop everything and focus

Items.Name: Reality Manipulator
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 3[^Money] for every [^Dimensional] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Dimensional] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: Thanks to this machine, I just have to snap my fingers and half my problems go away

Items.Name: Space Yachts
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] for every non [^Yellow] invention you own and gain 10[^Money]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 5[^Money]
Items.Flavor: Space Yachts are not taxed  and have a wonderful view

Items.Name: Strange Prediction Device
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Money] for each [^Purple] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: I’m purple

Items.Name: Omni Producer
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1 core resource and choose two to gain:
5[^Money], 1[^Science], 1[^Parts], 1[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Choose one to gain
Items.Flavor: The science on this gets a little fuzzy, just like what it produces

Items.Name: Moon Mining Apparatus
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 2[^Parts]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 2[^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Do we really need a moon?

Items.Name: Marketing Neural Net
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 4[^Money] for every [^Yellow] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Yellow] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: Humans are so manipulatable! Don’t you agree, creator?

Items.Name: Corite Mining
Items.Text:
When you [[BoldText invent]] this, gain 3[^Parts], gain 1[^Evil]

At the start of stage 2 lose 3[^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Named after where it comes from, found only in the planet's core

Items.Name: Energy Bank
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Energy] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Activity] off the top of the deck that gives [^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Collecting interest on my energy

Items.Name: Unlimited Potental AI
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 3[^Money] for every [^Purple] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Purple] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: A truly creative Future

Items.Name: Temporal Factory
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^ChronoMatter], gain 1[^Science], gain 1[^Parts], gain 1[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 1[^ChronoMatter], gain 1[^Science], gain 1[^Parts], gain 1[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: This factory might be a normal speed factory, but its running at a different clock speed

Items.Name: Dimension Mapper
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Money] for each [^Dimensional] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: To understand the nature of parallel dimensions, we must map the differences

Items.Name: Temporal Market Program
Items.Text: You may buy [^Science], [^Parts], or [^Energy] for 5[^Money]
Items.Flavor: Uranium is dirt cheap if you know where in history to buy them

Items.Name: Mobile Power Plant
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Energy], gain 2[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: Providing power to those who have been cut off from power

Items.Name: Parts Black Market Program
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Parts] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Activity] off the top of the deck that gives [^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Isn't that our prototype Battery being sold...

Items.Name: Medcial Tech Program
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science], gain 2[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: The cure to that disease is coming out next month

Items.Name: Pollution Killing Nanites
Items.Text:
At the start of stage 2 gain 7[^Good]

[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: If we produce enough of these nanites, people will be able to safely breathe everywhere

Items.Name: Automated Experimenting
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Parts], gain 2[^Science]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Science]
Items.Flavor: The Last 301,789 experiments were failures, but I'm optimistic

Items.Name: Hardened Energy Producer
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Energy], gain 2[^Parts]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Energy you can hold!

Items.Name: Yesterday's Shipping Program
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 5[^Money], gain 2[^Parts]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Parts]
Items.Flavor: I needed this part yesterday, time to order it in the Past

Items.Name: Unstable Extracter
Items.Text:
At the start of stage 2 gain 4[^Parts]

[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Parts]
Items.Flavor: It's gotta be carefully watched if you wanna get anything from this

Items.Name: Intro to Future Sciences
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for each different type of invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: Why pick to look at one catagory of future science when you can find out about them all

Items.Name: Multitasker Implant
Items.Text: You start with one additional card in your pack and you may choose an additional card for your first pick
Items.Flavor: Most people can only think one thought at once, but thankfully, I'm not most people

Items.Name: Dimensional Phone
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Money] for each different color of invention you invented this turn
Items.Flavor: I've got a guy I can call for that

Items.Name: Energy Converter
Items.Text: You may convert [^Energy] into [^Science] or [^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Energy Materialization, Facinating!

Items.Name: Black Hole Analyzer
Items.Text:
At the start of stage 2 gain 4[^Science]

[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Science]
Items.Flavor: Once we have finished analyzing this black hole, we will know the secrets of the universe

Items.Name: Biotech Scanners
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Money] for each [^Biotech] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: Humanity’s next step in evolution is just a scan away

Items.Name: Matter Converter
Items.Text: You may convert [^Parts] into [^Energy] or [^Science]
Items.Flavor: It doesn't matter what I put in this converter

Items.Name: Cross-Researching AI
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Money] for each different type of invention you invented this turn
Items.Flavor: Some people say I’m a mad scientist, but I prefer to be called "cross-researcher"

Items.Name: Alternate Universe Portal
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 1[^Evil]

During [[BoldText Act]] phase, D&R 3[^Activity]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R 3 more [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: AUs are my life!

Items.Name: Fake Solar Power
Items.Text:
When you [[BoldText invent]] this, gain 3[^Energy], gain 1[^Evil]

At the start of stage 2 lose 3[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: We pretend we get it from the sun, but in the end it might come back to bite us

Items.Name: Time Stealing Device
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 1[^ChronoMatter]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], Gain 1[^ChronoMatter], D&R 1[^Activity]
Items.Flavor: You were not going to use this time as well as I am, you didn't deserve it

Items.Name: Green Publicity City
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Money] for each [^Green] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: We make everyone's lives easier, and with the newest model, things just got easier

Items.Name: Power Dispenser
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 5[^Money], gain 2[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 5[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Hope this doesn’t steal my cred!

Items.Name: Chrono Matter Capturer
Items.Text:
At the start of stage 2 gain 3[^ChronoMatter] and D&R 1[^Activity]

[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 4[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^ChronoMatter] and D&R 1[^Activity]
Items.Flavor: This device is really good at getting chrono matter, but it doesn't like to share

Items.Name: Robotic Catalog
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Money] for each [^Robotic] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: On the horizon of robotic tech, you may own a robot chef

Items.Name: Human Battery
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 2[^Energy]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Evil], gain 2[^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Living humans are an incredible power source; Our prisons could be human power plants!

Items.Name: Chaos Die
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Roll a die and gain
1: 1[^Evil]   2: 1[^Good]   3: 1[^Science]
4: 1[^Energy]   5: 1[^Parts]   6: 1[^ChronoMatter]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy][[WingDings3 u]] You may do this 1 additional time this round
Items.Flavor: These things are outlawed in 9,000 dimensions

Items.Name: Yellow Futures
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^VictoryPoint] for each [^Yellow] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: Elites rule the future

Items.Name: Pocket Dimension
Items.Text: Worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Dimensional] invention you own
Items.Flavor: My own private dimension

Items.Name: Emergency Time Bubble Program
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^ChronoMatter], gain 7[^VictoryPoint]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Lose 1[^ChronoMatter], gain 5[^VictoryPoint]
Items.Flavor: Sometimes all you need is a few hours longer to save lives

Items.Name: Enhanced Form
Items.Text: Worth 2 addtional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Biotech] invention you own
Items.Flavor: Behold! My true form!

Items.Name: Medical Nanites
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Money] for every non [^Yellow] invention you own and gain 4[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 5[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 3[^Good]
Items.Flavor: You can't even catch a cold with these inside you

Items.Name: Personal Megacorp
Items.Text: Worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Purple] invention you own
Items.Flavor: I’m like all the other megacorps except I’m the only employee

Items.Name: Super Antivirus
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Science] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Activity] off the top of the deck that gives [^Science]
Items.Flavor: Bio weapons don’t stand a chance against this new antivirus

Items.Name: Future Sciences Shaper
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each different type of invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: A way to create a race for tech by hyping it up in the present

Items.Name: Random Good Acts Device
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Roll a die and gain
1: 1[^Evil]   2: 1[^Good]   3: 2[^Good]
4: 3[^Good]   5: 4[^Good]   6: 5[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 7[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] You may do this 1 additional time this round
Items.Flavor: It helps random people, though there was one time it helped detonate a bomb....

Items.Name: Benevolent AI
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good] for each different type of invention you invented this turn
Items.Flavor: Being technological sweep to benefit the world!

Items.Name: Robotic Mental Link
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Parts], gain 4[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: Imagine if you had a group of robots that responded to your thoughts

Items.Name: Infinite Power Exploit Device
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Energy] equal to the number of [[BoldText Energy]] inventions you own

This is worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Energy] you have
Items.Flavor: Before time travel, there was no way to change the amount of energy in the universe

Items.Name: Robotic Futures
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good] for each [^Robotic] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: I have robotic chef, and a butler...

Items.Name: Mimic Machine
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Reactivate another invention

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each [[BoldText Activate]] invention you own
Items.Flavor: It’s what I need it to be

Items.Name: Automated Future
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [[BoldText Produce]] invention you own

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Produce] invention you own
Items.Flavor: No one has to work anymore, people only work if they want to

Items.Name: Holopark
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Future] [^Activity] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Future] [^Activity] off the top of the deck
Items.Flavor: Come and enjoy the Future today at Holopark

Items.Name: Future Societies Shaper
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each different color of invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: A way to shape future societies through ingenious idea placement

Items.Name: Tech Stealing Device
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Future] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: It’s hard to prove this was someone else’s tech when I clearly invented it first

Items.Name: World Domination Program
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 3[^Evil]

This is worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each [[BoldText Evil]] invention you own
Items.Flavor: My ultimate goal? World domination of course!

Items.Name: Elitist Scientific Community
Items.Text: This is worth 1 less [^VictoryPoint] for each non [^Yellow] invention you own
Items.Flavor: One of those closed portal communities

Items.Name: Linch Pin Program
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Past] [^Activity] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Past] [^Activity] off the top of the deck
Items.Flavor: It's like dominoes, just watch as my plan unfolds

Items.Name: Energy Scarcity Generator
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Energy] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Activity] off the top of the deck that gives [^Energy]
Items.Flavor: Let’s make sure this planned energy crisis leaves us on top

Items.Name: Rainbow Showcase
Items.Text: Worth 6 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each set of all 3 color inventions you have invented
Items.Flavor: To bedazzle and impress!

Items.Name: Immortality Implant
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good] for every [^Yellow] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Yellow] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: The things people will pay you in exchange for immortality...

Items.Name: Energy Backup Grid
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Energy], gain 4[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: In case of emergency

Items.Name: High-Tech Warehouse
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Parts] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Activity] off the top of the deck that gives [^Parts]
Items.Flavor: Like a library for technology

Items.Name: Illuminati Device
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Present] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: Pulling the strings...

Items.Name: Invention Emporium
Items.Text: Worth 6 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each set of all 3 types of inventions you have invented
Items.Flavor: Take a look around my vast collection

Items.Name: Universal Translator
Items.Text: Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Green] inventions you own
Items.Flavor: Have you ever wondered what your pet was trying to communicate?

Items.Name: Philanthropist Clone
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Present] [^Activity] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Present] [^Activity] off the top of the deck
Items.Flavor: How does he have time to come to all these charity events, and run a lab?

Items.Name: World Freedom Program
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 3[^Good]

[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] For every [[BoldText Good]] invention you own gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: Ensuring freedom to all, with exceptions of course

Items.Name: Society Shaping Program
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good] for each different color of invention you invented this turn
Items.Flavor: A lot of good can be done when you are communicating with all sides of society

Items.Name: Elite Space Station
Items.Text: Worth 3 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Yellow] invention you own
Items.Flavor: Where the richest individuals live

Items.Name: Omega Factory
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^VictoryPoint] for every invention you invented this turn that has an [^Parts] cost

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find one that costs [^Parts] and draw it
Items.Flavor: Parts for everyone

Items.Name: Dimensional Solutions
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good] for each [^Dimensional] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: Every problem has already been solved in some dimension

Items.Name: Temporal Energy Stream
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Energy]
Items.Flavor: We can now use energy from other points in time without disrupting their power supply

Items.Name: Rube Goldberg Machine
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 4[^Good]

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each other Rube Goldburg Machine you own
Items.Flavor: ...A dragon forms from the ashes of that state...

Items.Name: Helper Drones
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^VictoryPoint] for every [^Robotic] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Robotic] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: I can’t believe how inconvenient life must have been before these drone existed

Items.Name: Ultimate Scientific Library
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Science]
Items.Flavor: Any invention you come up with has already been recorded in the library

Items.Name: Robotic City
Items.Text: Worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Robotic] invention you own
Items.Flavor: Every building, every artificial tree is a robot in this town

Items.Name: Rube Goldberg Machine
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 4[^Good]

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each other Rube Goldburg Machine you own
Items.Flavor: ...That bomb blows up a state...

Items.Name: Iteration Device
Items.Text:
This invention is 1 resource cheaper for each [[BoldText Invent]] invention you have

This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [[BoldText Invent]] invention you have
Items.Flavor: Inventions are never perfect on your first attempt; It’s all about iterating quickly

Items.Name: Dimensional Fracking
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^VictoryPoint] for every [^Dimensional] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Dimensional] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: Yes, it's mass murder, but it's not mass murder in this dimension

Items.Name: Company Buyout Program
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 5[^Money] for each [[BoldText Money]] Invention you have

This is worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every 5[^Money] you have
Items.Flavor: I own a good percentage of all companies under various shell corporations

Items.Name: Death Detection Satellite
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 1[^Science], gain 4[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: With this, we can detect if people are harmed across the world, and hopefully save them

Items.Name: Reforming Nanites
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that gain [^Parts]
Items.Flavor: All our parts are repurposable instantly with a bit of code

Items.Name: Biotech Futures
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good] for each [^Biotech] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: Why hold onto humanity?

Items.Name: Chaos Realm Portal
Items.Text:
[[BoldText End of Game]][[WingDings3 u]] Roll dice equal to number of [[BoldText Chaos]] inventions you own 
This is worth additional [^VictoryPoint] equal to the result of the dice
1: -1    2: 0   3: 1
4: 2   5: 3   6: 4
Items.Flavor: I harness the energies of the Chaos Realm itself

Items.Name: Omega Vault
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] cost on each [^Activity] that only gain [^Money]
Items.Flavor: The Omega Vault holds wealth beyond imagination with a temporal security system

Items.Name: Direction Heat Satellite
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Pay 5[^Money], gain 4[^Good]

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 2[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^Good]
Items.Flavor: Providing Heat to those who need it the most

Items.Name: Resurrection Program
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^VictoryPoint] for every [^Biotech] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Biotech] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: Solving new ways to bring your loved ones back

Items.Name: Robotic Building Microbots
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Parts] equal to the number of [[BoldText Parts]] inventions you own

This is worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Parts] you have
Items.Flavor: Who needs walls when you can have tiny robots BE the walls!

Items.Name: Optimized Time Machine
Items.Text:
You may [[BoldText invent]] this anytime

[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain [^ChronoMatter] equal to the number of [[BoldText Chrono]] inventions you have

This is worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] you have at the end of the game
Items.Flavor: Don't worry about paradoxes, my time machine will have had been optimized!

Items.Name: Ultimate Analyzer Satellite
Items.Text:
[^Produce][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Science] equal to the number of [[BoldText Science]] inventions you own

This is worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^Science] you have
Items.Flavor: The more data I feed, the more that satellite can analyze everything going on

Items.Name: Dimensional Streaming
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Activity] that only gain [^Money] this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] D&R the first [^Activity] off the top of the deck that gives only [^Money]
Items.Flavor: Supply the best TV shows accross the multiverse

Items.Name: Secret Intelligence Agency
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^VictoryPoint] for every [^Purple] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Purple] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: We are in the business of collecting information; Not using it

Items.Name: Quantum Computing
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^VictoryPoint] for every invention you invented this turn that has an [^Parts] cost

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find one that costs [^Parts] and draw it
Items.Flavor: Unlimited computational power

Items.Name: Time Museum
Items.Text: This is worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for every [^ChronoMatter] spent on [^Past] [^Activity]
Items.Flavor: The key to the Future is the Past

Items.Name: Purple Futures
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good] for each [^Purple] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: A very strange future indeed

Items.Name: Terraformer
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^Good] for every [^Green] invention you invented this turn

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find a [^Green] invention and draw it
Items.Flavor: We have already established colonies on Mars! Next up: Venus

Items.Name: Green Futures
Items.Text: [^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 1[^VictoryPoint] for each [^Green] invention you [[BoldText drafted]] this turn
Items.Flavor: Truly a vast array of inventions

Items.Name: Zero Point Power
Items.Text:
[^Activate][[WingDings3 u]] Gain 2[^VictoryPoint] for every invention you invented this turn that has an [^Energy] cost

[^Overclock] 1[^Energy] 1[^Money][[WingDings3 u]] Reveal cards from this stage's invention deck until you find one that costs [^Energy] and draw it
Items.Flavor: Powering tomorrow's world today

Items.Name: Interdimensional Trading Hub
Items.Text:
You may buy and sell [^Science], [^Parts], and [^Energy] for 5[^Money]

This invention is worth 2 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each [[BoldText Trade]] invention you own
Items.Flavor: I’m sure they won’t use this plutonium for anything harmful

Items.Name: Rube Goldberg Machine
Items.Text:
When invented, gain 4[^Good]

Worth 1 additional [^VictoryPoint] for each other Rube Goldburg Machine you own
Items.Flavor: ...A Time Traveller fights the dragon...
